notes: Tool for manual on-line annotation of corpora at various linguistic levels. The levels currently implemented are: word-level and sentence-level segmentation, morphosyntax, word sense disambiguation. Anotatornia implements sophisticated mechanisms of the management of texts, annotators and conflicts.
title: Anotatornia
